verses.verse: A Psalm of David. I will sing <WH7891> of lovingkindness <WH2617> and justice <WH4941>: Unto thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah, will I sing praises <WH2167>.

I will behave myself wisely <WH7919> in a perfect <WH8549> way <WH1870>: Oh when wilt thou come <WH935> unto me <WH1980>? I will walk within <WH7130> my house <WH1004> with a perfect <WH8537> heart <WH3824>.
I will set <WH7896> no base <WH1100> thing <WH1697> before mine eyes <WH5869>: I hate <WH8130> the work <WH6213> of them that turn aside <WH7750>; It shall not cleave unto me <WH1692>.
A perverse <WH6141> heart <WH3824> shall depart <WH5493> from me <WH3045>: I will know no evil thing <WH7451>.

Whoso privily <WH5643> slandereth <WH3960> his neighbor <WH7453>, him will I destroy <WH6789>: Him that hath a high <WH1362> look <WH5869> and a proud <WH7342> heart <WH3824> will I not suffer <WH3201>.

Mine eyes <WH5869> shall be upon the faithful <WH539> of the land <WH776>, that they may dwell <WH3427> with me <WH1980>: He that walketh in a perfect <WH8549> way <WH1870>, he shall minister unto me <WH8334>.

He that worketh <WH6213> deceit <WH7423> shall not dwell <WH3427> within <WH7130> my house <WH1004>: He that speaketh <WH1696> falsehood <WH8267> shall not be established <WH3559> before mine eyes <WH5869>.

Morning <WH1242> by morning will I destroy <WH6789> all the wicked <WH7563> of the land <WH776>; To cut off <WH3772> all the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> from the city <WH5892> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
